body: These changes allow the AMReX smoke test to run when MPI is not enabled. They also allow the test to run when `rocm` is enabled. To test `rocm` functionality, it is necessary to use the updated `CMakeLitsts.txt` for the smoke test in PR: https://github.com/AMReX-Codes/amrex/pull/2629
title: Changes to enable the hip gpu backend and no mpi for the smoke test.
